title: Find What You're Looking for with MarkLogic Big Data Search
abstract: Finding the right data and content in the ever growing world of information is a key challenge and having the right information quickly is a critical advantage. Whats needed is a new approach to search - Big Data Search. In this session MarkLogics Chief Technologist of Media Solutions Matt Turner, will review the real-world examples of MarkLogic is changing the game in search by: Addressing every element of your data with flexible schema and universal indexing Pinpointing information using integrated search functions Getting users the latest information with alerts Scaling out to 10s of billions of records Join us for a lively session with demonstrations and discussion and find what youre looking for!
